## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G22250](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G22250)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtCAF1b, CAF1b</u>
- **Gene Name:** CCR4- associated factor 1b, CCR4- associated factor 1b
- **Description:**   Polynucleotidyl transferase, ribonuclease H-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
